explanation: The stage direction describes the setting by specifying the façade of the palace of Danaüs and mentioning the very dark night that prevails over the theater. This description aligns with the category of 'setting', which focuses on the stage description or location in a play.
stgdir: Le théâtre change et représente la façade du palais de Danaüs, une nuit très obscure règne sur le théâtre.
